augments.name: 回归基本功
augments.description_html: Your champion abilities deal 35% increased damage and you gain 70 ability haste and 35% increased healing and shielding from all sources, but your Ultimate ability is permanently sealed.
augments.description: 你的英雄技能造成的伤害增加35% ，你获得70点技能急速，并从所有来源获得35%的治疗和护盾，但你的终极技能被永久封印。
augments.description_en: Your champion abilities deal 35% increased damage and you gain 70 ability haste and 35% increased healing and shielding from all sources, but your Ultimate ability is permanently sealed.

augments.name: 史上最大雪球
augments.description_html: Upgrades <spell>Mark</spell> into massive snowball exploding on impact for <magic>200–350 magic damage</magic> (based on level, plus <ad>100% bonus AD</ad>, <ap>60% AP</ap>), <cc>knocking up</cc> and <slow>slowing</slow> enemies. Reduces Mark cooldown by <ah>100 ability haste</ah> equivalent.
augments.description: 将标记升级为巨大的雪球，在撞击时爆炸，造成200–350点法术伤害（基于等级，加上100%的额外攻击力， 60%的怒气值） ，击倒敌人并减速敌人。标记冷却时间减少100技能加速当量。
augments.description_en: Upgrades Mark into massive snowball exploding on impact for 200–350 magic damage (based on level, plus 100% bonus AD, 60% AP), knocking up and slowing enemies. Reduces Mark cooldown by 100 ability haste equivalent.

augments.name: 利刃华尔兹
augments.description_html: Replaces Flee with Blade Waltz. Blade Waltz: Blink to the target enemy champion. After 0.25 seconds, you then blink to the nearest enemy champion every 0.25 seconds over the next 1.75 seconds, blinking up to 7 additional times. Each time you blink to a target, deal 30 – 150 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 6% AP) physical damage to them and apply on-hit effects at 50% effectiveness, up to a total of 240 – 1200 (based on level) (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 48% AP).While Blade Waltz is active, you are untargetable and unable to act. This effect will end prematurely if there are no longer any nearby valid targets to blink to. A target can be blinked to more than once.
augments.description: 用刀片华尔兹取代逃离。刀锋华尔兹：向目标敌方英雄眨眼。 0.25 秒后，你会在接下来的 1.75 秒内每 0.25 秒向最近的敌方英雄眨眼一次，最多再眨眼 7 次。每次你向目标眨眼时，都会对其造成 30 – 150（基于等级）（+ 10% 加成 AD）（+ 6% AP）点物理伤害，并以 50% 的效果施加击中效果，总计最多 240 – 1200（基于等级）（+ 80% 加值）AD) (+ 48% AP)。当剑刃华尔兹激活时，你无法成为目标并且无法行动。如果附近不再有任何有效目标可以眨眼，则此效果将提前结束。一个目标可以多次闪烁。
augments.description_en: Replaces Flee with Blade Waltz. Blade Waltz: Blink to the target enemy champion. After 0.25 seconds, you then blink to the nearest enemy champion every 0.25 seconds over the next 1.75 seconds, blinking up to 7 additional times. Each time you blink to a target, deal 30 – 150 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 6% AP) physical damage to them and apply on-hit effects at 50% effectiveness, up to a total of 240 – 1200 (based on level) (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 48% AP).While Blade Waltz is active, you are untargetable and unable to act. This effect will end prematurely if there are no longer any nearby valid targets to blink to. A target can be blinked to more than once.

augments.name: 你摸不到
augments.description_html: Casting your ultimate grants you invulnerability for 2 seconds (8 second cooldown).
augments.description: 释放你的终极技能会赋予你2秒的无敌状态（冷却时间为8秒）。
augments.description_en: Casting your ultimate grants you invulnerability for 2 seconds (8 second cooldown).

augments.name: 地狱三头犬
augments.description_html: Gain the Hail of Blades and Press the Attack keystone runes.See Arena#Runes for Arena-specific overrides on these runes.
augments.description: 获得刀刃冰雹并按下攻击拱心石符文。请参阅竞技场#符文以获得这些符文的竞技场特定覆盖。
augments.description_en: Gain the Hail of Blades and Press the Attack keystone runes.See Arena#Runes for Arena-specific overrides on these runes.

augments.name: 连锁闪电
augments.description_html: Dealing damage to an enemy champion also damages the nearest other champion within 800 units of them for true damage equal to 40% of the damage instance post-mitigation.
augments.description: 对一名敌方英雄造成伤害还会伤害距离其800个单位内最近的其他英雄，真实伤害相当于减免后伤害次数的40%。
augments.description_en: Dealing damage to an enemy champion also damages the nearest other champion within 800 units of them for true damage equal to 40% of the damage instance post-mitigation.

augments.name: 死亡之环
augments.description_html: Healing and health regeneration you do causes you to deal 70% of that value in magic damage to the nearest enemy champion within 1000 units.
augments.description: 你所做的治疗和生命回复会使你对1000个单位内最近的敌方英雄造成70%的法术伤害。
augments.description_en: Healing and health regeneration you do causes you to deal 70% of that value in magic damage to the nearest enemy champion within 1000 units.

augments.name: 小丑学院
augments.description_html: Gain Shaco's Backstab, Deceive and Hallucinate's explosion. Replaces Flee with Deceive. Passive - Backstab: Your basic attacks deal 20 – 35 (based on level) (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 35% AP) bonus physical damage on-hit when hitting an enemy from behind. Active - Deceive: Become invisible for up to 3 seconds and blink to the target location within 400 units after a 0.125-second delay. Your next basic attack while in stealth deals 100 (+ 150% bonus AD) (+ 55% AP) bonus physical damage, increased to 155 (+ 232.5% bonus AD) (+ 85.25% AP) bonus physical damage 155% damage if Backstab was applied (15 second cooldown). Passive - Hallucinate: Upon your death, release an explosion in a 350 radius of your death location, dealing 25% of target's maximum health true damage to enemies within and fearing them for 1 second. This effect cannot award victory to the user if they are the last one standing on their team.
augments.description: 获得萨科的背刺、欺骗和幻觉的爆炸。用欺骗代替逃跑。被动 - 背刺：当你从背后击中敌人时，你的普通攻击会造成 20 – 35（基于等级）（+ 50% 加成 AD）（+ 35% AP）点额外物理伤害。主动 - 欺骗：隐形长达 3 秒，并在 0.125 秒延迟后闪烁到 400 单位内的目标位置。你潜行时的下一次普通攻击造成 100 点（+ 150% 额外 AD）(+ 55% AP) 额外物理伤害，增加至 155 (+ 232.5% 额外 AD) (+ 85.25% AP) 额外物理伤害 如果使用背刺，则伤害为 155%（15 秒冷却时间）。被动 - 幻觉：你死亡后，在死亡位置周围 350 半径范围内释放爆炸，对范围内的敌人造成相当于目标最大生命值 25% 的真实伤害，并使其恐惧 1 秒。如果用户是最后一个站立的人，则此效果无法将胜利授予用户他们的团队。
augments.description_en: Gain Shaco's Backstab, Deceive and Hallucinate's explosion. Replaces Flee with Deceive. Passive - Backstab: Your basic attacks deal 20 – 35 (based on level) (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 35% AP) bonus physical damage on-hit when hitting an enemy from behind. Active - Deceive: Become invisible for up to 3 seconds and blink to the target location within 400 units after a 0.125-second delay. Your next basic attack while in stealth deals 100 (+ 150% bonus AD) (+ 55% AP) bonus physical damage, increased to 155 (+ 232.5% bonus AD) (+ 85.25% AP) bonus physical damage 155% damage if Backstab was applied (15 second cooldown). Passive - Hallucinate: Upon your death, release an explosion in a 350 radius of your death location, dealing 25% of target's maximum health true damage to enemies within and fearing them for 1 second. This effect cannot award victory to the user if they are the last one standing on their team.

augments.name: 巨像的勇气
augments.description_html: Immobilizing or grounding an enemy champion grants a shield for 3 seconds that absorbs 100 – 300 (based on level) (+ 5% maximum health) damage (5 second cooldown per cast instance). Shields can stack between multiple triggers of this effect, though not refreshing the duration of previous shields.
augments.description: 使敌方英雄定身或接地会赋予一个护盾，持续3秒，吸收100 – 300点伤害（基于等级） （ +5%最大生命值） （每个施法次数冷却5秒）。护盾可以在该效果的多个触发器之间叠加，但不会刷新之前护盾的持续时间。
augments.description_en: Immobilizing or grounding an enemy champion grants a shield for 3 seconds that absorbs 100 – 300 (based on level) (+ 5% maximum health) damage (5 second cooldown per cast instance). Shields can stack between multiple triggers of this effect, though not refreshing the duration of previous shields.

augments.name: 残忍
augments.description_html: Immobilizing/grounding enemies summons comet landing after 1 second, dealing <magic>50–150 magic damage</magic> (based on level, plus <ap>40% AP</ap>, <health>4% max health</health>).
augments.description: 定身/禁锢敌人1秒后召唤彗星着陆，造成50–150点法术伤害（基于等级，附加40%怒气值，生命上限4% ）。
augments.description_en: Immobilizing/grounding enemies summons comet landing after 1 second, dealing 50–150 magic damage (based on level, plus 40% AP, 4% max health).

augments.name: 全凭身法
augments.description_html: Abilities with dashes or blinks gain 300 ability haste.On Kalista, Martial Poise's dash gains 80% bonus movement speed toward its speed scaling instead.
augments.description: 冲刺或闪烁技能获得300技能急速。
augments.description_en: Abilities with dashes or blinks gain 300 ability haste.On Kalista, Martial Poise's dash gains 80% bonus movement speed toward its speed scaling instead.

augments.name: 亮出你的剑
augments.description_html: Become melee, modifying your attack range to 200 units. Additionally, gain 35% bonus attack damage, 25% bonus attack speed, 35% bonus health, 25% bonus movement speed, and 25% life steal. These bonuses are increased by 0% – 30% (based on attack range).This augment is only available for ranged champions.
augments.description: 成为近战，将攻击范围调整为200个单位。此外，获得攻击伤害加成35%、攻击速度加成25%、生命加成35%、移动速度加成25%、吸血25%。这些加成提升0% -30% （基于攻击范围）。此增强仅适用于远程英雄。
augments.description_en: Become melee, modifying your attack range to 200 units. Additionally, gain 35% bonus attack damage, 25% bonus attack speed, 35% bonus health, 25% bonus movement speed, and 25% life steal. These bonuses are increased by 0% – 30% (based on attack range).This augment is only available for ranged champions.

augments.name: 双刀流
augments.description_html: Increase your total attack speed by 25%. Every second attack, launch a bolt that repeats 40% of the original attack's pre-mitigation damage and applies on-hit effects at 40% effectiveness.
augments.description: 提升你的总攻击速度25%。每秒攻击一次，发射一个霹雳，重复原始攻击减免前伤害的40% ，并以40%的效果施加命中效果。
augments.description_en: Increase your total attack speed by 25%. Every second attack, launch a bolt that repeats 40% of the original attack's pre-mitigation damage and applies on-hit effects at 40% effectiveness.

augments.name: 大地苏醒
augments.description_html: Dashing or blinking causes you to leave behind a trail from the location you moved to your destination that detonates after 0.75 seconds in a 300 radius, dealing 140 – 300 (based on level) (+ 125% bonus AD) (+ 40% AP) physical damage per explosion to enemies hit. Enemies can only be affected once every 0.5 seconds from all cast instances.
augments.description: 冲刺或闪烁会导致你从移动到目的地的位置留下痕迹，在300半径内0.75秒后引爆，每次爆炸对被击中的敌人造成140 – 300 （基于等级） （ + 125%怒气值加成） （ + 40%怒气值）的物理伤害。所有施法次数中，敌人每0.5秒只能受到一次影响。
augments.description_en: Dashing or blinking causes you to leave behind a trail from the location you moved to your destination that detonates after 0.75 seconds in a 300 radius, dealing 140 – 300 (based on level) (+ 125% bonus AD) (+ 40% AP) physical damage per explosion to enemies hit. Enemies can only be affected once every 0.5 seconds from all cast instances.

augments.name: 至高天的诺言
augments.description_html: Replaces summoner with <spell>Vigilance</spell> active (dash to ally granting <shield>shields 100–250</shield> based on level). Gain <heal>15% heal and shield power</heal>.
augments.description: 将召唤者替换为警戒状态（冲刺至友方，根据等级赋予护盾100–250 ）。获得15%治疗和护盾能量。
augments.description_en: Replaces summoner with Vigilance active (dash to ally granting shields 100–250 based on level). Gain 15% heal and shield power.

augments.name: 尤里卡
augments.description_html: Gain ability haste equal to 30% AP.
augments.description: 获得相当于30%怒气值的技能急速。
augments.description_en: Gain ability haste equal to 30% AP.

augments.name: 连拨击锤
augments.description_html: Your next basic attack in each cardinal direction within 750 range additionally on-attack fires 5 bolts at the target that each deal 10 – 52.5 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) physical damage, for a total of 50 – 262.5 (based on level) (+ 75% bonus AD) physical damage (5 second cooldown per direction). Bolts' damage is increased by 0% – 50% (based on distance travelled). Each bolt can critically strike and applies on-hit effects at 20% effectiveness.
augments.description: 您在750范围内的每个基本方向的下一次基本攻击额外向目标发射5枚炮弹，每枚炮弹造成10 – 52.5点（基于等级） （ +15%额外AD ）物理伤害，总计50 – 262.5点（基于等级） （ +75%额外AD ）物理伤害（每个方向5秒冷却时间）。螺栓的伤害增加0% -50% （基于行驶距离）。每个螺栓都可以以20 ％的有效性进行致命打击并施加击中效果。
augments.description_en: Your next basic attack in each cardinal direction within 750 range additionally on-attack fires 5 bolts at the target that each deal 10 – 52.5 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) physical damage, for a total of 50 – 262.5 (based on level) (+ 75% bonus AD) physical damage (5 second cooldown per direction). Bolts' damage is increased by 0% – 50% (based on distance travelled). Each bolt can critically strike and applies on-hit effects at 20% effectiveness.

augments.name: 感受燃烧
augments.description_html: Replaces Flee with Feel the Burn. Additionally, Ignite counts as a Burn source. Feel the Burn: Casts both Exhaust and Ignite on all enemy champions within 1000 units, with the former having its slow strength increased to 50% and the latter modified to deal 100 – 600 (based on level) true damage over the duration.
augments.description: 将Flee替换为Feel the Burn。此外，点燃算作燃烧源。燃烧之感：对1000个单位内的所有敌方英雄施加疲惫和点燃，前者的缓慢强度提高到50% ，后者在持续时间内调整为造成100 – 600 （基于等级）的真实伤害。
augments.description_en: Replaces Flee with Feel the Burn. Additionally, Ignite counts as a Burn source. Feel the Burn: Casts both Exhaust and Ignite on all enemy champions within 1000 units, with the former having its slow strength increased to 50% and the latter modified to deal 100 – 600 (based on level) true damage over the duration.

augments.name: 精怪魔法
augments.description_html: Damaging enemies with your ultimate ability polymorphs them into harmless critters for 2 seconds, during which their base movement speed is reduced by 60, and disarms them for the same duration (15 second cooldown per target).
augments.description: 使用你的终极技能对敌人造成伤害，使他们变身为无害的小动物，持续2秒，在此期间，他们的基本移动速度降低60 ，并在相同时间内解除他们的武装（每个目标冷却15秒）。
augments.description_en: Damaging enemies with your ultimate ability polymorphs them into harmless critters for 2 seconds, during which their base movement speed is reduced by 60, and disarms them for the same duration (15 second cooldown per target).

augments.name: 最终形态
augments.description_html: <spell>Ultimate</spell> casting empowers 10 seconds: gain <shield>shield</shield> (<shield>50% max health</shield>), <omnivamp>20% omnivamp</omnivamp>, <ms>30% bonus movement speed</ms> (20 second cooldown).
augments.description: 终极施法可提升10秒：获得护盾（最大生命值的50% ）、20% omnivamp、30%移动速度加成（冷却20秒）。
augments.description_en: Ultimate casting empowers 10 seconds: gain shield (50% max health), 20% omnivamp, 30% bonus movement speed (20 second cooldown).

augments.name: 砍伤
augments.description_html: Basic attacks deal <truedmg>20–40 bonus true damage</truedmg> (melee, based on level, plus <armor>25% bonus armor</armor>) or <truedmg>10–20</truedmg> (ranged, plus <armor>20% bonus armor</armor>); gain <as>50% bonus attack speed</as>.
augments.description: 普通攻击造成20–40点额外真实伤害（近战，基于等级，外加25%护甲加成）或10–20点伤害（远程，外加20%护甲加成） ；获得50%攻击速度加成。
augments.description_en: Basic attacks deal 20–40 bonus true damage (melee, based on level, plus 25% bonus armor) or 10–20 (ranged, plus 20% bonus armor); gain 50% bonus attack speed.

augments.name: 巨人杀手
augments.description_html: Become tiny, reducing your size by 75% and gaining 30% bonus movement speed. Additionally, deal 10% / 15% / 25% / 30% (based on target's size) bonus damage against enemy champions with greater size than you.
augments.description: 变得更小，体型缩小75% ，移动速度提升30%。此外，对身高比你大的敌方英雄造成10%/15%/25%/30% （基于目标身高）的额外伤害。
augments.description_en: Become tiny, reducing your size by 75% and gaining 30% bonus movement speed. Additionally, deal 10% / 15% / 25% / 30% (based on target's size) bonus damage against enemy champions with greater size than you.

augments.name: 玻璃大炮
augments.description_html: <health>Health</health> capped at <health>70% maximum</health> (unmodifiable); deal <truedmg>15% bonus true damage</truedmg> of all damage dealt post-mitigation.
augments.description: 生命值上限为70% （不可修改） ；减免后造成的所有伤害额外增加15%的真实伤害。
augments.description_en: Health capped at 70% maximum (unmodifiable); deal 15% bonus true damage of all damage dealt post-mitigation.

augments.name: 夺金
augments.description_html: Basic attack/ability damage grants <gold>15 gold</gold> and <ms>25% bonus movement speed</ms> for 1.5 seconds; deals <magic>50–150 bonus magic damage</magic> (based on level, plus <ad>40% bonus AD</ad>, <ap>20% AP</ap>) (30 second cooldown per champion).
augments.description: 普通攻击/技能伤害提供15金和25%额外移动速度，持续1.5秒；造成50–150额外魔法伤害（基于等级，附加40%额外广告， 20%怒气值） （每个英雄冷却30秒）。
augments.description_en: Basic attack/ability damage grants 15 gold and 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds; deals 50–150 bonus magic damage (based on level, plus 40% bonus AD, 20% AP) (30 second cooldown per champion).

augments.name: 歌利亚巨人
augments.description_html: Grants 35% bonus maximum health, 15% adaptive force, and 50% size.
augments.description: 获得35%最大生命值加成、15%自适应力和50%体型。
augments.description_en: Grants 35% bonus maximum health, 15% adaptive force, and 50% size.

augments.name: 小猫咪找妈妈
augments.description_html: Bind to nearest allied champion after 2 seconds, forming tether (400 radius): gain <ms>75% bonus movement speed</ms> and <heal>50% heal/shield power</heal>. Gain <ms>37.5% bonus movement speed</ms> while facing bound ally (1500 units). Tether breaks on death.
augments.description: 2秒后绑定最近的友方英雄，形成绳索（半径400 ） ：获得75%的移动速度加成和50%的治疗/护盾力量。与绑定的队友对战时，获得37.5%的移动速度加成（ 1500个单位）。绳索在死亡时断裂。
augments.name_en: I'm a Baby Kitty Where is Mama
augments.description_en: Bind to nearest allied champion after 2 seconds, forming tether (400 radius): gain 75% bonus movement speed and 50% heal/shield power. Gain 37.5% bonus movement speed while facing bound ally (1500 units). Tether breaks on death.

augments.name: 炼狱导管
augments.description_html: Your ability hits apply a Burn for 5 seconds that deals 1.2 – 12 (based on level) (+ 2.8% bonus AD) (+ 1.2% AP) bonus magic damage per second 6 – 60 (based on level) (+ 14% bonus AD) (+ 6% AP) bonus magic damage over the duration (1 second cooldown per cast instance). This Burn stacks infinitely and refreshes with each application. Damage over time abilities can apply the effect only once every 2 seconds.Additionally, all of your Burn effects reduce the cooldowns of all your basic abilities by 0.08 seconds for each tick of damage they deal to a target.
augments.description: 你的技能击中会施加持续 5 秒的燃烧，每秒造成 1.2 – 12（基于等级）（+ 2.8% 额外 AD）（+ 1.2% AP）额外魔法伤害 6 – 60（基于等级）（+ 14% 额外 AD）（+ 6% AP）在持续时间内额外魔法伤害（每个施法实例冷却时间 1 秒）。此刻录可以无限堆叠并随每个应用程序刷新。持续伤害技能每 2 秒只能应用一次效果。此外，你的所有燃烧效果每对目标造成一次伤害，所有基本能力的冷却时间就会减少 0.08 秒。
augments.description_en: Your ability hits apply a Burn for 5 seconds that deals 1.2 – 12 (based on level) (+ 2.8% bonus AD) (+ 1.2% AP) bonus magic damage per second 6 – 60 (based on level) (+ 14% bonus AD) (+ 6% AP) bonus magic damage over the duration (1 second cooldown per cast instance). This Burn stacks infinitely and refreshes with each application. Damage over time abilities can apply the effect only once every 2 seconds.Additionally, all of your Burn effects reduce the cooldowns of all your basic abilities by 0.08 seconds for each tick of damage they deal to a target.

augments.name: 珠光护手
augments.description_html: Your abilities can now critically strike for (165% + bonus critical damage) damage. Additionally, gain 25% (+ 4.5% per 100 AP) critical strike chance.If both Jeweled Gauntlet and Vulnerability are equipped, only rolls the critical strike chance of the augment that has the higher critical damage (or either if equal).
augments.description: 你的技能现在可以造成暴击伤害（ 165% +暴击伤害加成）。此外，获得25% （每100点怒气值+4.5% ）暴击几率。如果同时装备了珠宝护手和漏洞，则只会翻滚具有较高暴击伤害（或者如果两者相同）的强化的暴击几率。
augments.description_en: Your abilities can now critically strike for (165% + bonus critical damage) damage. Additionally, gain 25% (+ 4.5% per 100 AP) critical strike chance.If both Jeweled Gauntlet and Vulnerability are equipped, only rolls the critical strike chance of the augment that has the higher critical damage (or either if equal).

augments.name: 尊我为王
augments.description_html: Entering enemy gate/Catapult grants random <prismatic>Prismatic augment</prismatic> and upgrades first <item>Legendary item</item> to <item>Masterwork variant</item> (adds <gold>1000 gold</gold> value).
augments.description: 进入敌人大门/弹射器可获得随机棱镜强化，并将第一个传奇道具升级为杰作变体（额外增加1000金币价值）。
augments.description_en: Entering enemy gate/Catapult grants random Prismatic augment and upgrades first Legendary item to Masterwork variant (adds 1000 gold value).

augments.name: 镭射眼
augments.description_html: Continuously fire a laser in a line 700 units from your facing direction, dealing 5 – 60 (based on level) (+ 14% AD) (+ 9% AP) magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in its width of 80 units.
augments.description: 从你面对的方向连续发射700个单位的激光，每0.25秒对其宽度为80个单位的敌人造成5-60点（基于等级） （ +14%自身攻击力） （ +9%怒气值）魔法伤害。
augments.description_en: Continuously fire a laser in a line 700 units from your facing direction, dealing 5 – 60 (based on level) (+ 14% AD) (+ 9% AP) magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in its width of 80 units.

augments.name: 激光治疗
augments.description_html: Replaces summoner with <spell>Laser Heal</spell>: channel up to 2.5 seconds projecting steerable energy beam <heal>healing allies 150–430</heal> (based on level, plus <ap>70% AP</ap>, <health>50% bonus health</health>) and <magic>damaging enemies 100–350</magic>, with <slow>20% slow</slow>.
augments.description: 用激光治疗代替召唤者：引导最多2.5秒投射可控能量束治疗友军150-430 （基于等级，附加70%怒气值， 50%生命值加成）并伤害敌人100–350 ，减速20%。
augments.description_en: Replaces summoner with Laser Heal: channel up to 2.5 seconds projecting steerable energy beam healing allies 150–430 (based on level, plus 70% AP, 50% bonus health) and damaging enemies 100–350, with 20% slow.

augments.name: 科学狂人
augments.description_html: At the start of the combat phase in each round, gain either 30% adaptive force, 20% bonus health, and 40% increased size or 70 ability haste, 40% bonus movement speed, and 40% reduced size.
augments.description: 每回合战斗阶段开始时，获得30%适应力、20%生命值加成、40%体型增加或70技能急速、40%移动速度加成、40%体型减小。
augments.description_en: At the start of the combat phase in each round, gain either 30% adaptive force, 20% bonus health, and 40% increased size or 70 ability haste, 40% bonus movement speed, and 40% reduced size.

augments.name: 物法皆修
augments.description_html: Basic attacks on-hit grant 6 – 18 (based on level) ability power and ability casts grant 3 – 9 (based on level) bonus attack damage. This effect stacks infinitely and lasts until the end of the current round phase.
augments.description: 命中时的普通攻击会给予6 – 18点（基于等级）技能能量和技能施法会给予3 – 9点（基于等级）攻击伤害加成。此效果无限叠加，并持续到当前回合阶段结束。
augments.description_en: Basic attacks on-hit grant 6 – 18 (based on level) ability power and ability casts grant 3 – 9 (based on level) bonus attack damage. This effect stacks infinitely and lasts until the end of the current round phase.

augments.name: 秘术冲拳
augments.description_html: Basic attacks on-hit reduce the cooldowns of your basic abilities by 20% of their remaining cooldown, with a minimum of 0.5 seconds.
augments.description: 命中时的普通攻击会使你的基本技能冷却时间减少剩余冷却时间的20% ，最少为0.5秒。
augments.description_en: Basic attacks on-hit reduce the cooldowns of your basic abilities by 20% of their remaining cooldown, with a minimum of 0.5 seconds.

augments.name: 不祥契约
augments.description_html: Abilities cost <health>5% current health</health>; gain <ap>AP based on missing health</ap> (up to <ap>75–150</ap> at 70% missing health), <ms>movement speed</ms> (0%–50%), <omnivamp>omnivamp</omnivamp> (0%–20%).
augments.description: 技能消耗5%当前生命值；根据失去的生命值（失去70%生命值时，获得最多75–150点生命值）、移动速度（ 0% –50% ）、万能球（ 0% –20% ）获得怒气值。
augments.description_en: Abilities cost 5% current health; gain AP based on missing health (up to 75–150 at 70% missing health), movement speed (0%–50%), omnivamp (0%–20%).

augments.name: 全能龙魂
augments.description_html: Grants 3 random Dragon Souls.
augments.description: 打开可随机获得3个龙魂
augments.description_en: Grants 3 random Dragon Souls.

augments.name: 轨道镭射
augments.description_html: Replaces Flee with Orbital Laser. Orbital Laser: Call upon an orbital laser to fire down on the target location after 2.5 seconds, immediately dealing true damage equal to the 30% of the target's maximum health then 45 – 120 (based on level) magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 3 seconds to enemies within a 550 radius, up to a total of 270 – 720 (based on level).
augments.description: 用轨道激光取代Flee。轨道激光：在2.5秒后召唤轨道激光击中目标位置，立即对550半径范围内的敌人造成相当于目标最大生命值30%的真实伤害，然后在3秒内每0.5秒造成45 – 120点（基于等级）魔法伤害，最多可达270 – 720点（基于等级）。
augments.description_en: Replaces Flee with Orbital Laser. Orbital Laser: Call upon an orbital laser to fire down on the target location after 2.5 seconds, immediately dealing true damage equal to the 30% of the target's maximum health then 45 – 120 (based on level) magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 3 seconds to enemies within a 550 radius, up to a total of 270 – 720 (based on level).

augments.name: 潘朵拉的盒子
augments.description_html: Your current augments transform into an equal number of completely random Prismatic ones.
augments.description: 你当前的强化变成了相同数量的完全随机的棱镜强化。
augments.description_en: Your current augments transform into an equal number of completely random Prismatic ones.

augments.name: 蛋白粉奶昔
augments.description_html: Gain <heal>25% heal and shield power</heal> (plus <heal>35%</heal> per <armor>100 bonus armor/magic resistance</armor>).
augments.description: 获得25%治疗和护盾力量（每100额外护甲/魔法抗性加35% ）。
augments.description_en: Gain 25% heal and shield power (plus 35% per 100 bonus armor/magic resistance).

augments.name: 量子计算
augments.description_html: Automatically cast an improved version of Camille's Tactical Sweep, winding over 0.75 seconds to slash in a 650 radius around you. The slash deals 200 – 350 (based on level) (+ 85% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP) physical damage to enemies within the area (10 second cooldown). Enemies hit by the outer edge of the circle take bonus physical damage equal to 10% (+ 2.5% per 100 bonus AD) (+ 1.6% per 100 AP) (+ 0.1% per 100 bonus health) of their maximum health and are slowed by 80% decaying over 2 seconds. Additionally, you are healed for 80% of the bonus post-mitigation damage against enemy champions hit by the outer edge.
augments.description: 自动施放卡米尔战术横扫的改进版本，在 0.75 秒内缠绕你周围 650 半径的范围内进行猛击。斩击对区域内的敌人造成 200 – 350（基于等级）（+ 85% 加成 AD）（+ 50% AP）物理伤害（10 秒冷却时间）。被圆圈外缘击中的敌人会受到相当于其最大生命值 10%（+ 每 100 点额外 AD 2.5%）（+ 每 100 点 AP 1.6%）（+ 0.1% 每 100 点额外生命值）的额外物理伤害并且在 2 秒内衰减速度减慢 80%。此外，当你受到外缘击中的敌方英雄时，你会获得缓解后额外伤害的 80% 的治疗效果。
augments.description_en: Automatically cast an improved version of Camille's Tactical Sweep, winding over 0.75 seconds to slash in a 650 radius around you. The slash deals 200 – 350 (based on level) (+ 85% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP) physical damage to enemies within the area (10 second cooldown). Enemies hit by the outer edge of the circle take bonus physical damage equal to 10% (+ 2.5% per 100 bonus AD) (+ 1.6% per 100 AP) (+ 0.1% per 100 bonus health) of their maximum health and are slowed by 80% decaying over 2 seconds. Additionally, you are healed for 80% of the bonus post-mitigation damage against enemy champions hit by the outer edge.

augments.name: 靴中靴，王中王
augments.description_html: <quest>Quest</quest>: Complete random boots quests (basic attacks, movement, ability casts, crowd control, plating reduction, ability damage) to receive <item>Jarvan I's</item> item. Cannot purchase boots while equipped.
augments.description: 任务：完成随机靴子任务（普通攻击、移动、技能施放、人群控制、减少盘子、技能伤害）可获得贾文一世的道具。装备后无法购买靴子。
augments.description_en: Quest: Complete random boots quests (basic attacks, movement, ability casts, crowd control, plating reduction, ability damage) to receive Jarvan I's item. Cannot purchase boots while equipped.

augments.name: 任务：沃格勒特的巫师帽
augments.description_html: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod that has its ability power stat modified to 120 AP.Quest: Obtain Rabadon's Deathcap and Zhonya's Hourglass.Reward: Upon completing your Quest, convert the items you obtained for the quest into Wooglet's Witchcap.
augments.description: 获得一根技能能量值改为120怒气值的不必要的大棒。任务：获得拉巴顿的死亡盖帽和张雅的沙漏。奖励：完成任务后，将任务获得的道具转换成伍格莱特的巫帽。
augments.description_en: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod that has its ability power stat modified to 120 AP.Quest: Obtain Rabadon's Deathcap and Zhonya's Hourglass.Reward: Upon completing your Quest, convert the items you obtained for the quest into Wooglet's Witchcap.

augments.name: 最万用的瞄准镜
augments.description_html: Gain ( 250 / 150) bonus attack range.
augments.description: 获得(250/150)攻击加成范围。
augments.description_en: Gain ( 250 / 150) bonus attack range.

augments.name: 慢炖
augments.description_html: Surrounds you in flames, causing you to apply a Burn every second to enemies within 500 units for 5 seconds that deals magic damage equal to 0.35% of your maximum health per second. 1.75% of your maximum health over the duration. This Burn stacks infinitely and refreshes with each application.
augments.description: 将你包围在火焰中，使你每秒对500个单位内的敌人施加一次灼烧，持续5秒，造成相当于每秒最大生命值0.35%的魔法伤害。持续时间为最大生命值的1.75%。此刻录无限叠加，并随每个应用程序刷新。
augments.description_en: Surrounds you in flames, causing you to apply a Burn every second to enemies within 500 units for 5 seconds that deals magic damage equal to 0.35% of your maximum health per second. 1.75% of your maximum health over the duration. This Burn stacks infinitely and refreshes with each application.

augments.name: 雪球扭蛋机
augments.description_html: <spell>Mark</spell> hits cast random harmful summoner on target; Mark dash casts random beneficial summoner on arrival. Reduces Mark cooldown by <ah>100 ability haste</ah> equivalent.
augments.description: 标记命中会随机对目标施放有害召唤物；标记冲刺会在目标到达时随机施放有益召唤物。标记冷却时间减少100技能加速当量。
augments.description_en: Mark hits cast random harmful summoner on target; Mark dash casts random beneficial summoner on arrival. Reduces Mark cooldown by 100 ability haste equivalent.

augments.name: 升级：雪球
augments.description_html: <spell>Mark</spell> empowered to hail snowstorm at hit location for 2 seconds, granting <ms>movement speed</ms> and <cc>slow immunity</cc> to you.
augments.description: 标记被赋予在命中位置冰雹暴风雪的力量，持续2秒，为您提供移动速度和减速免疫。
augments.description_en: Mark empowered to hail snowstorm at hit location for 2 seconds, granting movement speed and slow immunity to you.

augments.name: 战争交响乐
augments.description_html: Gain the Conqueror and Lethal Tempo keystone runes.See Arena#Runes for Arena-specific overrides on these keystones.
augments.description: 获得征服者和致命节奏拱心石符文。查看竞技场#符文，在这些拱心石上获得竞技场特有的覆盖。
augments.description_en: Gain the Conqueror and Lethal Tempo keystone runes.See Arena#Runes for Arena-specific overrides on these keystones.

augments.name: 踢踏舞
augments.description_html: Basic attacks on-hit grant 10 bonus movement speed, stacking infinitely and lasting until the end of the current round phase. Additionally, gain bonus attack speed equal to 10% movement speed.
augments.description: 基本命中攻击会获得10个移动速度加成，无限叠加，持续到当前回合阶段结束。此外，获得相当于10%移动速度的额外攻击速度。
augments.description_en: Basic attacks on-hit grant 10 bonus movement speed, stacking infinitely and lasting until the end of the current round phase. Additionally, gain bonus attack speed equal to 10% movement speed.

augments.name: 质变：混沌
augments.description_html: Gain two completely random augments, excluding the other two offerings in your current assortment.
augments.description: 获得两种完全随机的强化，不包括你当前种类中的其他两种产品。
augments.description_en: Gain two completely random augments, excluding the other two offerings in your current assortment.

augments.name: 精准奇才
augments.description_html: Upon damaging an enemy while located at over 700 units away at the time of the hit, cast Ezreal's Trueshot Barrage in their direction. The barrage deals 175 – 525 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 70% AP) magic damage to enemies it passes through (5 second cooldown per target).
augments.description: 在命中距离超过700个单位时对一名敌人造成伤害时，向他们的方向施放埃兹雷尔的真枪弹幕。弹幕对其通过的敌人造成175-525点（基于等级） （ +100%额外广告） （ +70%怒气值）法术伤害（每个目标5秒冷却时间）。
augments.description_en: Upon damaging an enemy while located at over 700 units away at the time of the hit, cast Ezreal's Trueshot Barrage in their direction. The barrage deals 175 – 525 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 70% AP) magic damage to enemies it passes through (5 second cooldown per target).

augments.name: 终极刷新
augments.description_html: Casting your ultimate ability resets its cooldown immediately after its effect starts or has elapsed. This may occur only once per phase in a round.
augments.description: 施放你的终极技能会在效果开始或结束后立即重置其冷却时间。这在一轮中每个阶段只能发生一次。
augments.description_en: Casting your ultimate ability resets its cooldown immediately after its effect starts or has elapsed. This may occur only once per phase in a round.

augments.name: 终极刷新
augments.description_html: Replaces Flee with a random champion's ultimate ability, available from a pool. After using the granted ultimate ability during the combat phase, replace the ultimate in the respective slot with another random one after the cooldown for this effect elapses (20 / 17.5 / 15 (based on level) second cooldown, increased to 25 / 22.5 / 20 (based on level) for Dr. Mundo's Maximum Dosage).Ultimate Ability Pool: Cho'Gath's Feast, Dr. Mundo's Maximum Dosage, Gangplank's Cannon Barrage, Gragas' Explosive Cask, Lucian's The Culling, Lux's Final Spark, Morgana's Soul Shackles.You can receive your own champion's ultimate ability from this augment. Ultimate abilities granted by this effect count as an ultimate for all purposes.
augments.description: 用随机冠军的终极能力取代逃跑，该能力可从池中获得。在战斗阶段使用授予的终极能力后，在该效果的冷却时间结束后，将相应插槽中的终极能力替换为另一个随机能力（20 / 17.5 / 15（基于等级）第二次冷却，蒙多博士的最大剂量增加到25 / 22.5 / 20（基于等级））。终极能力池：科加斯的盛宴，蒙多博士的最大剂量剂量、普朗克的火炮弹幕、古拉加斯的爆炸桶、卢锡安的剔除、拉克丝的最后火花、莫甘娜的灵魂枷锁。你可以从这个增强中获得你自己的冠军的终极能力。此效果所赋予的终极能力在所有目的上都算作终极能力。
augments.description_en: Replaces Flee with a random champion's ultimate ability, available from a pool. After using the granted ultimate ability during the combat phase, replace the ultimate in the respective slot with another random one after the cooldown for this effect elapses (20 / 17.5 / 15 (based on level) second cooldown, increased to 25 / 22.5 / 20 (based on level) for Dr. Mundo's Maximum Dosage).Ultimate Ability Pool: Cho'Gath's Feast, Dr. Mundo's Maximum Dosage, Gangplank's Cannon Barrage, Gragas' Explosive Cask, Lucian's The Culling, Lux's Final Spark, Morgana's Soul Shackles.You can receive your own champion's ultimate ability from this augment. Ultimate abilities granted by this effect count as an ultimate for all purposes.

augments.name: 全心为你
augments.description_html: Your heals and shields on allied champions are increased in effectiveness by 30%.
augments.description: 你对友方英雄的治疗和护盾效果提升30%。
augments.description_en: Your heals and shields on allied champions are increased in effectiveness by 30%.

augments.name: 尖端发明家
augments.description_html: Grants 300 item haste, which is equivalent to 75% cooldown reduction for items.
augments.description: 获得300道具急速，道具冷却时间减少75%。
augments.description_en: Grants 300 item haste, which is equivalent to 75% cooldown reduction for items.

augments.name: 超强大脑
augments.description_html: At the start of the combat phase in each round, gain a shield that absorbs damage equal to 300% AP and lasts until destroyed.
augments.description: 在每个回合的战斗阶段开始时，获得一个吸收相当于300%怒气值的伤害的护盾，并持续到被摧毁。
augments.description_en: At the start of the combat phase in each round, gain a shield that absorbs damage equal to 300% AP and lasts until destroyed.

augments.name: 面包和黄油
augments.description_html: Your champion's first basic ability (Q) gains 200 ability haste.
augments.description: 你的英雄的第一个基本技能（ Q ）获得200技能急速。
augments.description_en: Your champion's first basic ability (Q) gains 200 ability haste.

augments.name: 面包和奶酪
augments.description_html: Your champion's third basic ability (E) gains 200 ability haste.
augments.description: 你的英雄的第三个基本技能（ E ）获得200技能急速。
augments.description_en: Your champion's third basic ability (E) gains 200 ability haste.

augments.name: 面包和果酱
augments.description_html: Your champion's second basic ability (W) gains 200 ability haste.
augments.description: 你的英雄的第二个基本技能（ W ）获得200技能急速。
augments.description_en: Your champion's second basic ability (W) gains 200 ability haste.

augments.name: 星界躯体
augments.description_html: Gain 1250 bonus health, but reduce your damage output by 10%.
augments.description: 获得1250点生命值加成，但伤害输出降低10%。
augments.description_en: Gain 1250 bonus health, but reduce your damage output by 10%.

augments.name: 作弊：我能回城！
augments.description_html: <spell>Recall</spell> becomes functional (Empowered); items purchasable outside shop; fountain provides <heal>healing/restoration</heal>.
augments.description: 召回功能（授权） ；可在商店外购买物品；喷泉提供治疗/修复。
augments.description_en: Recall becomes functional (Empowered); items purchasable outside shop; fountain provides healing/restoration.

augments.name: 连招大师
augments.description_html: Gain the Electrocute and Phase Rush keystone runes.See Arena#Runes for Arena-specific overrides on these runes.
augments.description: 获得电击和阶段冲刺拱心石符文。查看竞技场#符文，了解这些符文的竞技场特定覆盖。
augments.description_en: Gain the Electrocute and Phase Rush keystone runes.See Arena#Runes for Arena-specific overrides on these runes.

augments.name: 会心治疗
augments.description_html: Your heals and shields now have a chance equal to your critical strike chance to increase in effectiveness by 50%. Additionally, gain 25% critical strike chance.
augments.description: 你的治疗和护盾现在有机会与你的暴击几率相等，提高50%的效率。此外，获得25%暴击几率。
augments.description_en: Your heals and shields now have a chance equal to your critical strike chance to increase in effectiveness by 50%. Additionally, gain 25% critical strike chance.

augments.name: 暴击律动
augments.description_html: <crit>Critical strikes</crit> grant <as>6% bonus attack speed</as> (stacking to <as>60%</as>); gain <crit>25% critical strike chance</crit>.
augments.description: 暴击提供6%攻击速度加成（叠加至60% ） ；获得25%暴击几率。
augments.description_en: Critical strikes grant 6% bonus attack speed (stacking to 60%); gain 25% critical strike chance.

augments.name: 黎明使者的坚决
augments.description_html: Upon dropping below 50% maximum health for the first time, you are healed for 30% maximum health over 3 seconds.
augments.description: 首次低于50%最大生命值时，在3秒内恢复30%最大生命值。
augments.description_en: Upon dropping below 50% maximum health for the first time, you are healed for 30% maximum health over 3 seconds.

augments.name: 魔鬼之舞
augments.description_html: Gain the Fleet Footwork and Grasp of the Undying keystone runes.See Arena#Runes for Arena-specific overrides on these runes.
augments.description: 获得舰队步法和掌握不朽的拱心石符文。查看竞技场#符文，了解这些符文的竞技场特定覆盖。
augments.description_en: Gain the Fleet Footwork and Grasp of the Undying keystone runes.See Arena#Runes for Arena-specific overrides on these runes.

augments.name: 神圣干预
augments.description_html: Automatically cast Taric's Cosmic Radiance, calling down a protective star upon you that descends over 2.5 seconds. Afterwards, you and your teammate within 400 units become invulnerable for 2.5 seconds (35 second cooldown). This effect activates 9.5 seconds after the start of the Combat Phase.
augments.description: 自动施放塔里克的宇宙光辉，召唤一颗保护之星降临在你身上，持续时间超过 2.5 秒。之后，你和你400单位内的队友将变得无敌，持续2.5秒（35秒冷却时间）。该效果在战斗阶段开始后 9.5 秒生效。
augments.description_en: Automatically cast Taric's Cosmic Radiance, calling down a protective star upon you that descends over 2.5 seconds. Afterwards, you and your teammate within 400 units become invulnerable for 2.5 seconds (35 second cooldown). This effect activates 9.5 seconds after the start of the Combat Phase.

augments.name: 虚幻武器
augments.description_html: Your abilities apply on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness (1 second cooldown per target).
augments.description: 你的技能以 100% 的效率施加击中效果（每个目标 1 秒冷却时间）。
augments.description_en: Your abilities apply on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness (1 second cooldown per target).

augments.name: 火上浇油
augments.description_html: Basic attacks apply a Burn for 5 seconds that deals bonus magic damage equal to 0.4% of the target's maximum health per second. 2% of the target's maximum health over the duration. This Burn stacks infinitely and refreshes with each application.
augments.description: 普通攻击会造成持续 5 秒的燃烧，每秒造成相当于目标最大生命值 0.4% 的额外魔法伤害。持续时间内目标最大生命值的 2%。此刻录可以无限堆叠并随每个应用程序刷新。
augments.description_en: Basic attacks apply a Burn for 5 seconds that deals bonus magic damage equal to 0.4% of the target's maximum health per second. 2% of the target's maximum health over the duration. This Burn stacks infinitely and refreshes with each application.

augments.name: 闪现向前
augments.description_html: Your Flash now has 3 charges with a 2-second cooldown between casts, gaining maximum charges at the start of each phase in a round. Additionally, the cooldown of your Flash resets every round.
augments.description: 你的闪电侠现在有 3 次充能，施放之间有 2 秒的冷却时间，在一轮中每个阶段开始时获得最大充能。此外，闪光的冷却时间每轮都会重置。
augments.description_en: Your Flash now has 3 charges with a 2-second cooldown between casts, gaining maximum charges at the start of each phase in a round. Additionally, the cooldown of your Flash resets every round.

augments.name: 有始有终
augments.description_html: Gain the Dark Harvest and First Strike keystone runes. Additionally, for each augment equipped before selecting this one, gain 8 Souls of Dark Harvest for free.See Arena#Runes for Arena-specific overrides on these keystones.
augments.description: 获得黑暗收割和先发打击基石符文。此外，在选择此增强之前，每装备一个增强，都可以免费获得 8 个黑暗收割之魂。请参阅竞技场#符文，了解这些基石上特定于竞技场的覆盖。
augments.description_en: Gain the Dark Harvest and First Strike keystone runes. Additionally, for each augment equipped before selecting this one, gain 8 Souls of Dark Harvest for free.See Arena#Runes for Arena-specific overrides on these keystones.

augments.name: 罪恶快感
augments.description_html: Champion takedowns grant <ms>100% bonus movement speed</ms> and <as>15% total attack speed</as> for 4 seconds.
augments.description: 击倒冠军可获得 100% 额外移动速度和 15% 总攻击速度，持续 4 秒。
augments.description_en: Champion takedowns grant 100% bonus movement speed and 15% total attack speed for 4 seconds.

augments.name: 帽子戏法
augments.description_html: Gain 3 hats upon selecting this augment and permanently reduce the cost of Cappa Juice in your shop by 350. Upon dropping below 30% of your maximum health, gain 35% total movement speed and a 300 – 500 (based on level) (+ 75% bonus movement speed) shield for 3 seconds, but lose one hat every time this effect activates (3 second cooldown).
augments.description: 选择此增强后获得 3 顶帽子，并永久地将你商店中的卡帕果汁成本降低 350 点。当你的最大生命值低于 30% 时，获得 35% 总移动速度和 300 – 500（基于等级）（+ 75% 额外移动速度）护盾，持续 3 秒，但每次此效果激活时都会失去一顶帽子（3 秒冷却时间）。
augments.description_en: Gain 3 hats upon selecting this augment and permanently reduce the cost of Cappa Juice in your shop by 350. Upon dropping below 30% of your maximum health, gain 35% total movement speed and a 300 – 500 (based on level) (+ 75% bonus movement speed) shield for 3 seconds, but lose one hat every time this effect activates (3 second cooldown).

augments.name: 圣火
augments.description_html: Your heals and shields cause you to fire a missile to the nearest enemy champion within 650 units over 0.32 seconds, applying a Burn upon arrival that deals magic damage equal to 0.2% of the target's maximum health every second over 5 seconds, for a total of 1% (1.5-second cooldown).The Burn's per-tick damage increases to up to 0.8% of the target's maximum health based on the relative value of the triggering heal or shield against the maximum health of the ally recipient, for a total maximum damage of 4% of the target's maximum health.
augments.description: 你的治疗和护盾会让你在 0.32 秒内向 650 个单位内最近的敌方英雄发射一枚导弹，到达后施加灼烧，在 5 秒内每秒造成相当于目标最大生命值 0.2% 的魔法伤害，总共造成 1%（1.5 秒冷却时间）。根据触发治疗或护盾相对于盟友接收者的最大生命值，最大总伤害为目标最大生命值的 4%。
augments.description_en: Your heals and shields cause you to fire a missile to the nearest enemy champion within 650 units over 0.32 seconds, applying a Burn upon arrival that deals magic damage equal to 0.2% of the target's maximum health every second over 5 seconds, for a total of 1% (1.5-second cooldown).The Burn's per-tick damage increases to up to 0.8% of the target's maximum health based on the relative value of the triggering heal or shield against the maximum health of the ally recipient, for a total maximum damage of 4% of the target's maximum health.

augments.name: 不动如山
augments.description_html: Gain the Aftershock and Glacial Augment keystone runes.
augments.description: 获得余震和冰川增强梯形符文。
augments.description_en: Gain the Aftershock and Glacial Augment keystone runes.

augments.name: 关键暴击
augments.description_html: Grants 50% critical strike chance.
augments.description: 提供 50% 暴击率。
augments.description_en: Grants 50% critical strike chance.

augments.name: 杀戮时间到了
augments.description_html: Upon casting your ultimate ability, you apply Zed's Death Mark to all enemy champions (8 second cooldown). The mark stores 40% of all post-mitigation damage dealt to the affected target, detonating after 5 seconds to deal true damage equal to the damage stored against them.If this augment's cooldown elapses during the channel of Fiddlesticks' Crowstorm, Galio's Hero's Entrance or Pantheon's Grand Starfall, this effect activates right before their first respective damaging effect activates.
augments.description: 施展你的终极技能后，你会将劫的死亡印记应用到所有敌方英雄身上（8秒冷却时间）。该标记存储了对受影响目标造成的所有缓解后伤害的 40%，5 秒后引爆，造成相当于对其存储的伤害的真实伤害。如果在费德提克的乌鸦风暴、加里奥的英雄入口或万神殿的大星陨通道期间此增强的冷却时间已过，则该效果会在它们各自的第一个伤害效果激活之前激活。
augments.description_en: Upon casting your ultimate ability, you apply Zed's Death Mark to all enemy champions (8 second cooldown). The mark stores 40% of all post-mitigation damage dealt to the affected target, detonating after 5 seconds to deal true damage equal to the damage stored against them.If this augment's cooldown elapses during the channel of Fiddlesticks' Crowstorm, Galio's Hero's Entrance or Pantheon's Grand Starfall, this effect activates right before their first respective damaging effect activates.

augments.name: 基石法师
augments.description_html: Gain the Arcane Comet and Summon Aery keystone runes.See Arena#Runes for Arena-specific overrides on Summon Aery.
augments.description: 获得奥术彗星并召唤艾瑞基石符文。有关召唤艾瑞的竞技场特定覆盖，请参阅竞技场#符文。
augments.description_en: Gain the Arcane Comet and Summon Aery keystone runes.See Arena#Runes for Arena-specific overrides on Summon Aery.

augments.name: 闪电打击
augments.description_html: Increase your bonus attack speed gained from all sources by 20%. While at 3.0 attack speed or higher, your basic attacks deal 40 bonus magic damage on-hit.
augments.description: 将从所有来源获得的额外攻击速度提高 20%。当攻击速度为 3.0 或更高时，你的普通攻击击中时会造成 40 点额外魔法伤害。
augments.description_en: Increase your bonus attack speed gained from all sources by 20%. While at 3.0 attack speed or higher, your basic attacks deal 40 bonus magic damage on-hit.

augments.name: 魔法飞弹
augments.description_html: Dealing damage to an enemy with an ability within 1000 units fires 3 missiles at them that each deal true damage equal to 0.33% of the target's maximum health, increased to up to 1% based on distance travelled. This effect can only trigger once every 6 seconds from the same cast.
augments.description: 对能力在 1000 单位以内的敌人造成伤害时，会向其发射 3 枚导弹，每枚导弹造成的真实伤害等于目标最大生命值的 0.33%，根据行进距离增加至最高 1%。该效果只能在同一施法中每 6 秒触发一次。
augments.description_en: Dealing damage to an enemy with an ability within 1000 units fires 3 missiles at them that each deal true damage equal to 0.33% of the target's maximum health, increased to up to 1% based on distance travelled. This effect can only trigger once every 6 seconds from the same cast.

augments.name: 神射法师
augments.description_html: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage equal to 100% AP.
augments.description: 普通攻击造成相当于 100% AP 的额外物理伤害。
augments.description_en: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage equal to 100% AP.

augments.name: 仆从大师
augments.description_html: Your pets deal 40% increased damage as well as gain 40% bonus health and size.
augments.description: 你的宠物造成的伤害增加 40%，生命值和体型增加 40%。
augments.description_en: Your pets deal 40% increased damage as well as gain 40% bonus health and size.

augments.name: 夜狩
augments.description_html: Takedown within 3 seconds of damaging enemy renders you <stealth>invisible</stealth> 1.5 seconds.
augments.description: 3 秒内击倒敌人造成伤害，使你隐形 1.5 秒。
augments.description_en: Takedown within 3 seconds of damaging enemy renders you invisible 1.5 seconds.

augments.name: 回力OK镖
augments.description_html: Automatically cast Sivir's Boomerang Blade at a nearby enemy, dealing 40 – 200 (based on level) (+ 22% bonus AD) (+ 15% AP) adaptive damage to enemies hit (7 second cooldown).
augments.description: 自动向附近的敌人施放希维尔的回旋镖之刃，对击中的敌人造成 40 – 200（基于等级）（+ 22% 加成 AD）（+ 15% AP）自适应伤害（7 秒冷却时间）。
augments.description_en: Automatically cast Sivir's Boomerang Blade at a nearby enemy, dealing 40 – 200 (based on level) (+ 22% bonus AD) (+ 15% AP) adaptive damage to enemies hit (7 second cooldown).

augments.name: 狂徒豪气
augments.description_html: Dashing or blinking grants 12 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance, stacking up to 5 times for a total of 60 bonus resistances. This effect lasts until the end of the current round phase.
augments.description: 冲刺或眨眼可获得 12 点额外护甲值和额外魔法抗性，最多可叠加 5 次，总计 60 点额外抗性。该效果持续到当前回合阶段结束。
augments.description_en: Dashing or blinking grants 12 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance, stacking up to 5 times for a total of 60 bonus resistances. This effect lasts until the end of the current round phase.

augments.name: 溢流
augments.description_html: Your abilities' mana costs are doubled, but you also gain 10% (+ 0.5% per 100 maximum mana) increased damage as well as self and outgoing healing and shielding.
augments.description: 你的技能的法力消耗加倍，但你也获得 10%（每 100 最大法力 + 0.5%）伤害以及自我和传出治疗和护盾。
augments.description_en: Your abilities' mana costs are doubled, but you also gain 10% (+ 0.5% per 100 maximum mana) increased damage as well as self and outgoing healing and shielding.

augments.name: 坚韧
augments.description_html: Grants 800% base health regeneration, increased to 1600% while below 25% maximum health.
augments.description: 提供 800% 基础生命值再生，在最大生命值低于 25% 时增加至 1600%。
augments.description_en: Grants 800% base health regeneration, increased to 1600% while below 25% maximum health.

augments.name: 任务：疯狂帽子人
augments.description_html: Quest: Wear 10 hats simultaneously.Reward: For each hat currently worn, gain 10 adaptive force, 6 bonus armor, 6 bonus magic resistance, 0.5% tenacity, and 3 bonus movement speed. However, you now lose half your hats upon losing a round.If the requirements are fulfilled at any point during a Combat Phase, only grants the rewards after the end of the current round. Rewards cannot be earned mid-combat.
augments.description: 任务：同时佩戴10顶帽子。奖励：当前佩戴的每顶帽子，获得10点适应力、6点额外护甲、6点额外魔法抗性、0.5%韧性和3点额外移动速度。但是，现在输掉一轮后你会失去一半的帽子。如果在战斗阶段的任何时候满足要求，则只会在当前回合结束后授予奖励。奖励无法在战斗中获得。
augments.description_en: Quest: Wear 10 hats simultaneously.Reward: For each hat currently worn, gain 10 adaptive force, 6 bonus armor, 6 bonus magic resistance, 0.5% tenacity, and 3 bonus movement speed. However, you now lose half your hats upon losing a round.If the requirements are fulfilled at any point during a Combat Phase, only grants the rewards after the end of the current round. Rewards cannot be earned mid-combat.

augments.name: 任务：钢化你心
augments.description_html: Quest: Obtain Heartsteel and accumulate over 400 bonus health from Colossal Consumption.Reward: Upon completing your Quest, increase the bonus health gained from Heartsteel's Colossal Consumption by 500% and gain bonus health regeneration equal to 12.5% of the bonus health gained from Colossal Consumption.
augments.description: 任务：获得心钢并从巨额消耗中积累超过400点额外生命值。奖励：完成任务后，将心钢的巨额消耗中获得的额外生命值增加500%，并获得相当于巨额消耗中获得的额外生命值12.5%的额外生命回复。
augments.description_en: Quest: Obtain Heartsteel and accumulate over 400 bonus health from Colossal Consumption.Reward: Upon completing your Quest, increase the bonus health gained from Heartsteel's Colossal Consumption by 500% and gain bonus health regeneration equal to 12.5% of the bonus health gained from Colossal Consumption.

augments.name: 任务：海牛阿福的勇士
augments.description_html: Quest: Score 8 champion takedowns, up to one for each enemy per round. Takedowns scored on revived targets do not count for this effect.Reward: Upon completing your Quest, you receive The Golden Spatula.
augments.description: 任务：击倒 8 名冠军，每轮每个敌人最多击倒 1 次。对复活目标的击倒不计入此效果。奖励：完成任务后，您将收到金铲。
augments.description_en: Quest: Score 8 champion takedowns, up to one for each enemy per round. Takedowns scored on revived targets do not count for this effect.Reward: Upon completing your Quest, you receive The Golden Spatula.

augments.name: 古式佳酿
augments.description_html: Casting an ability heals you for 5 – 60 (based on level) (+ 1% maximum health).
augments.description: 施展技能可以治愈你 5 – 60 点（基于等级）（+ 1% 最大生命值）。
augments.description_en: Casting an ability heals you for 5 – 60 (based on level) (+ 1% maximum health).

augments.name: 循环往复
augments.description_html: Grants 60 ability haste.
augments.description: 提供 60 点技能急速。
augments.description_en: Grants 60 ability haste.

augments.name: 无休回复
augments.description_html: Heal for 0.2 – 1.2 (based on level) (+ 0.02% maximum health) per 10 units travelled.
augments.description: 每移动 10 单位可治疗 0.2 – 1.2（基于等级）（+ 0.02% 最大生命值）。
augments.description_en: Heal for 0.2 – 1.2 (based on level) (+ 0.02% maximum health) per 10 units travelled.

augments.name: 更万用的瞄准镜
augments.description_html: Gain ( 200 / 100) bonus attack range.
augments.description: 获得 ( 200 / 100) 额外攻击范围。
augments.description_en: Gain ( 200 / 100) bonus attack range.

augments.name: 炽烈黎明
augments.description_html: Gain Leona's Sunlight.Sunlight: Your abilities mark enemies, causing them to take 40 – 200 (based on level) (+ 3% of target's maximum health) bonus magic damage from your ally's next basic attack or ability hit against them (0.75-second cooldown per target).
augments.description: 获得蕾欧娜的阳光。阳光：你的技能会标记敌人，使他们从你的盟友的下一次普通攻击或技能攻击中受到 40 - 200（基于等级）（+ 目标最大生命值的 3%）额外魔法伤害（每个目标 0.75 秒冷却时间）。
augments.description_en: Gain Leona's Sunlight.Sunlight: Your abilities mark enemies, causing them to take 40 – 200 (based on level) (+ 3% of target's maximum health) bonus magic damage from your ally's next basic attack or ability hit against them (0.75-second cooldown per target).

augments.name: 缩小射线
augments.description_html: Basic attacks reduce the target's damage dealt by 15% for 3 seconds, refreshing with each hit. Their size is also reduced significantly for the duration.
augments.description: 普通攻击使目标造成的伤害降低15%，持续3秒，每次攻击都会刷新。在此期间，它们的尺寸也显着减小。
augments.description_en: Basic attacks reduce the target's damage dealt by 15% for 3 seconds, refreshing with each hit. Their size is also reduced significantly for the duration.

augments.name: 老练狙神
augments.description_html: Hitting an enemy with a basic ability while located at least 700 units away from them at the time of the hit reduces the current cooldown of that ability to 0.5 seconds. If the ability hit is from a damage over time effect, the cooldown of the ability is instead reduced to 3 seconds if it is not already below that.
augments.description: 使用基本能力击中距离至少 700 单位的敌人，该能力的当前冷却时间会缩短至 0.5 秒。如果该技能命中来自持续伤害效果，则该技能的冷却时间将减少至 3 秒（如果该冷却时间尚未低于该值）。
augments.description_en: Hitting an enemy with a basic ability while located at least 700 units away from them at the time of the hit reduces the current cooldown of that ability to 0.5 seconds. If the ability hit is from a damage over time effect, the cooldown of the ability is instead reduced to 3 seconds if it is not already below that.

augments.name: 一板一眼
augments.description_html: Your base attack speed is set to a static amount of 1.0 and your attack rate no longer benefits from any source of attack speed bonuses. In return, you convert every 1% bonus attack speed into 0.75 bonus attack damage.
augments.description: 你的基础攻击速度被设置为静态值 1.0，并且你的攻击速度不再受益于任何攻击速度加成。作为回报，你将每 1% 额外攻击速度转化为 0.75 额外攻击力。
augments.description_en: Your base attack speed is set to a static amount of 1.0 and your attack rate no longer benefits from any source of attack speed bonuses. In return, you convert every 1% bonus attack speed into 0.75 bonus attack damage.

augments.name: 灵魂虹吸
augments.description_html: Your critical strikes heal you for 12% of damage dealt. Additionally, gain 25% critical strike chance.
augments.description: 你的暴击会治愈你所造成伤害的 12%。此外，获得 25% 的暴击率。
augments.description_en: Your critical strikes heal you for 12% of damage dealt. Additionally, gain 25% critical strike chance.

augments.name: 坦克引擎
augments.description_html: Scoring a champion takedown permanently grants 5% bonus maximum health and 15% size. This effect can be triggered only once per champion per round.
augments.description: 击倒冠军将永久获得 5% 的最大生命值加成和 15% 的体型加成。每个英雄每轮只能触发一次该效果。
augments.description_en: Scoring a champion takedown permanently grants 5% bonus maximum health and 15% size. This effect can be triggered only once per champion per round.

augments.name: 残暴之力
augments.description_html: Grants 25 bonus attack damage, 10 ability haste, and 5 lethality.
augments.description: 提供 25 点额外攻击力、10 点技能急速和 5 点杀伤力。
augments.description_en: Grants 25 bonus attack damage, 10 ability haste, and 5 lethality.

augments.name: 穿针引线
augments.description_html: Grants 20% armor penetration and magic penetration.
augments.description: 提供 20% 的护甲穿透和魔法穿透。
augments.description_en: Grants 20% armor penetration and magic penetration.

augments.name: 质变：棱彩阶
augments.description_html: Gain one random Prismatic augment, excluding the other two offerings in your current assortment.
augments.description: 获得一种随机棱柱增强，不包括当前分类中的其他两种产品。
augments.description_en: Gain one random Prismatic augment, excluding the other two offerings in your current assortment.

augments.name: 接二连三
augments.description_html: Basic attacks generate a stack, up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, your next basic attack consumes all stacks to apply on-hit effects again at 150% effectiveness.
augments.description: 普通攻击会叠加，最多叠加2次。叠加 2 层后，你的下一次普通攻击会消耗所有层数，再次以 150% 的效果施加击中效果。
augments.description_en: Basic attacks generate a stack, up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, your next basic attack consumes all stacks to apply on-hit effects again at 150% effectiveness.

augments.name: 黎明使者的坚决
augments.description_html: Tier: God / S+
augments.description: 等级：神/S+
augments.description_en: Tier: God / S+

augments.name: 易损
augments.description_html: Damage dealt by items and damage over time effects can now critically strike for (155% + bonus critical damage) damage. Additionally, gain 25% critical strike chance.If both Vulnerability and Jeweled Gauntlet are equipped, only rolls the critical strike chance of the augment that has the higher critical damage (or either if equal).
augments.description: 物品造成的伤害和持续伤害效果现在可以造成暴击，造成（155% + 额外暴击伤害）伤害。此外，获得 25% 暴击率。如果同时装备了脆弱和宝石手套，则只会掷出具有更高暴击伤害的增强的暴击率（或者如果相等的话）。
augments.description_en: Damage dealt by items and damage over time effects can now critically strike for (155% + bonus critical damage) damage. Additionally, gain 25% critical strike chance.If both Vulnerability and Jeweled Gauntlet are equipped, only rolls the critical strike chance of the augment that has the higher critical damage (or either if equal).

augments.name: 急急小子
augments.description_html: Grants bonus movement speed equal to 150% ability haste.
augments.description: 获得相当于 150% 技能急速的额外移动速度。
augments.description_en: Grants bonus movement speed equal to 150% ability haste.

augments.name: 物理转魔法
augments.description_html: Convert all of your bonus attack damage into ability power at a rate of 1 ability power per 0.6 bonus attack damage. Additionally, increase your ability power by 15%.
augments.description: 将你的所有额外攻击力转化为法术强度，每 0.6 点额外攻击力转化为 1 点法术强度。此外，你的能力强度增加15%。
augments.description_en: Convert all of your bonus attack damage into ability power at a rate of 1 ability power per 0.6 bonus attack damage. Additionally, increase your ability power by 15%.

augments.name: 坚若磐石
augments.description_html: Immobilizing or grounding enemies grants stacking <armor>armor</armor> and <mr>magic resistance</mr> (<armor>2–10</armor> based on level, up to 10 stacks for <armor>20–100</armor> total).
augments.description: 固定或搁浅敌人会获得堆叠护甲和魔法抗性（根据等级 2-10，最多堆叠 10 层，总共 20-100）。
augments.description_en: Immobilizing or grounding enemies grants stacking armor and magic resistance (2–10 based on level, up to 10 stacks for 20–100 total).

augments.name: 大力
augments.description_html: Increases attack damage by 20%.
augments.description: 攻击力增加 20%。
augments.description_en: Increases attack damage by 20%.

augments.name: 霸符兄弟
augments.description_html: Grants Crest of Cinders and Crest of Insight permanently. Additionally, Crest of Cinders counts as a Burn source.
augments.description: 永久授予灰烬之冠和洞察之冠。此外，Crest of Cinders 也算作燃烧源。
augments.description_en: Grants Crest of Cinders and Crest of Insight permanently. Additionally, Crest of Cinders counts as a Burn source.

augments.name: 灵巧
augments.description_html: Grants 60% bonus attack speed.
augments.description: 给予 60% 额外攻击速度。
augments.description_en: Grants 60% bonus attack speed.

augments.name: 俯冲轰炸
augments.description_html: Your team's first death each round creates an explosion at the location of the champion that died, dealing true damage equal to 20% of the target's maximum health to enemies within 500 units. This effect cannot award victory to the user if they are the last one standing on their team.
augments.description: 你的队伍每轮第一次死亡都会在死亡英雄的位置产生爆炸，对 500 单位内的敌人造成相当于目标最大生命值 20% 的真实伤害。如果用户是团队中最后一个站立的人，则此效果无法将胜利授予用户。
augments.description_en: Your team's first death each round creates an explosion at the location of the champion that died, dealing true damage equal to 20% of the target's maximum health to enemies within 500 units. This effect cannot award victory to the user if they are the last one standing on their team.

augments.name: 唯快不破
augments.description_html: Deal 1% increased damage per 10 movement speed you have more than the target.
augments.description: 你的移动速度比目标每高 10 点，造成的伤害就会增加 1%。
augments.description_en: Deal 1% increased damage per 10 movement speed you have more than the target.

augments.name: 侵蚀
augments.description_html: Each instance of damage dealt to an enemy reduces their armor and magic resistance by 1.5% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 20 times for a total of 30% resistances reduction.
augments.description: 对敌人造成的每次伤害都会使他们的护甲和魔法抗性降低 1.5%，持续 4 秒，最多叠加 20 次，总共降低 30% 的抗性。
augments.description_en: Each instance of damage dealt to an enemy reduces their armor and magic resistance by 1.5% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 20 times for a total of 30% resistances reduction.

augments.name: 逃跑计划
augments.description_html: Dropping below <health>35% health</health> grants <shield>shield</shield> (<shield>65% max health</shield>), <ms>movement speed boost</ms> (<ms>150% bonus</ms>), and reduced size.
augments.description: 生命值低于 35% 时可获得护盾（最大生命值 65%）、移动速度提升（150% 奖励）和尺寸缩小。
augments.description_en: Dropping below 35% health grants shield (65% max health), movement speed boost (150% bonus), and reduced size.

augments.name: 裁决使
augments.description_html: Deal 15% increased damage to enemies below 50% of their maximum health. Scoring a champion takedown resets the cooldown of all your basic abilities.
augments.description: 对低于最大生命值 50% 的敌人造成的伤害提高 15%。击倒冠军会重置你所有基本能力的冷却时间。
augments.description_en: Deal 15% increased damage to enemies below 50% of their maximum health. Scoring a champion takedown resets the cooldown of all your basic abilities.

augments.name: 急救用具
augments.description_html: Grants 20% heal and shield power.
augments.description: 提供 20% 的治疗和护盾力量。
augments.description_en: Grants 20% heal and shield power.

augments.name: 闪闪现现
augments.description_html: Replaces second summoner with <spell>Flash</spell>; grants <ah>70 summoner spell haste</ah>. Both Flashes have independent cooldowns.
augments.description: 将第二个召唤师替换为闪电侠；提供 70 点召唤师法术急速。两种闪光都有独立的冷却时间。
augments.description_en: Replaces second summoner with Flash; grants 70 summoner spell haste. Both Flashes have independent cooldowns.

augments.name: 闪光弹
augments.description_html: Using Flash creates an explosion around the blink location that deals 70 – 240 (based on level) (+ 70% AD) (+ 60% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by 35% for 1.25 seconds. Additionally, the cooldown of your Flash resets every round.
augments.description: 使用闪光会在眨眼位置周围产生爆炸，对附近的敌人造成 70 – 240（基于等级）（+ 70% AD）（+ 60% AP）魔法伤害，并使其减速 35%，持续 1.25 秒。此外，闪光的冷却时间每轮都会重置。
augments.description_en: Using Flash creates an explosion around the blink location that deals 70 – 240 (based on level) (+ 70% AD) (+ 60% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by 35% for 1.25 seconds. Additionally, the cooldown of your Flash resets every round.

augments.name: 冰霜 幽灵
augments.description_html: Automatically cast Lissandra's Ring of Frost, creating a cold pulse around you in 450 radius that roots nearby enemies for 1.25 seconds (6.5 second cooldown).
augments.description: 自动施放丽桑卓的冰霜之环，在你周围 450 半径范围内产生冰冷脉冲，使附近的敌人定身 1.25 秒（6.5 秒冷却时间）。
augments.description_en: Automatically cast Lissandra's Ring of Frost, creating a cold pulse around you in 450 radius that roots nearby enemies for 1.25 seconds (6.5 second cooldown).

augments.name: 渴血
augments.description_html: Gain 20% omnivamp.
augments.description: 获得 20% 的全能增益。
augments.description_en: Gain 20% omnivamp.

augments.name: 帽上加帽
augments.description_html: Gain <ap>15 AP</ap> and <mr>8 bonus magic resistance</mr> per headwear item (reduced values for Cappa Juice hats).
augments.description: 每个头饰物品获得 15 AP 和 8 额外魔法抗性（Cappa Juice 帽子的价值降低）。
augments.description_en: Gain 15 AP and 8 bonus magic resistance per headwear item (reduced values for Cappa Juice hats).

augments.name: 重量级打击手
augments.description_html: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage equal to 3.5% of your maximum health.
augments.description: 基本攻击造成相当于最大生命值 3.5% 的额外物理伤害。
augments.description_en: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage equal to 3.5% of your maximum health.

augments.name: 家园卫士
augments.description_html: Gain 100% bonus movement speed. This bonus is lost for 3 seconds after dealing damage to or taking damage from champions.
augments.description: 获得 100% 额外移动速度。对英雄造成伤害或受到英雄伤害后，该加值会消失 3 秒。
augments.description_en: Gain 100% bonus movement speed. This bonus is lost for 3 seconds after dealing damage to or taking damage from champions.

augments.name: 冰寒
augments.description_html: Your slowing effects reduce the movement speed of targets by an additional 100.
augments.description: 你的减速效果会使目标的移动速度额外降低 100。
augments.description_en: Your slowing effects reduce the movement speed of targets by an additional 100.

augments.name: 炼狱龙魂
augments.description_html: Grants the Infernal Dragon Soul.
augments.description: 授予地狱龙魂。
augments.description_en: Grants the Infernal Dragon Soul.

augments.name: 练腿日
augments.description_html: Gain 50 bonus movement speed and 40% slow resist.
augments.description: 获得 50 额外移动速度和 40% 缓慢抵抗。
augments.description_en: Gain 50 bonus movement speed and 40% slow resist.

augments.name: 点亮他们！
augments.description_html: Basic attacks generate a stack, up to 4. The fourth stack consumes them all to quickly launch 4 fireworks at the target that each deal 11 – 80 (based on level) (+ 35% bonus AD) (+ 19% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit, for a total of 44 – 320 (based on level) (+ 140% bonus AD) (+ 76% AP).
augments.description: 普通攻击会叠加，最多 4 层。第四层消耗掉所有烟花，向目标快速发射 4 个烟花，每个烟花造成 11 – 80（基于等级）（+ 35% 加成 AD）（+ 19% AP）点额外魔法伤害，总计 44 – 320（基于等级）（+ 140% 加成 AD）（+ 76% AP）。
augments.description_en: Basic attacks generate a stack, up to 4. The fourth stack consumes them all to quickly launch 4 fireworks at the target that each deal 11 – 80 (based on level) (+ 35% bonus AD) (+ 19% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit, for a total of 44 – 320 (based on level) (+ 140% bonus AD) (+ 76% AP).

augments.name: 强力护盾
augments.description_html: Upon gaining <shield>shield</shield>, gain <adaptive>40–100 adaptive force</adaptive> (based on level) for 3 seconds (5 second cooldown).
augments.description: 获得护盾后，获得 40-100 适应性力量（基于等级），持续 3 秒（5 秒冷却时间）。
augments.description_en: Upon gaining shield, gain 40–100 adaptive force (based on level) for 3 seconds (5 second cooldown).

augments.name: 由心及物
augments.description_html: Grants bonus health equal to 50% maximum mana.
augments.description: 提供相当于最大法力值 50% 的额外生命值。
augments.description_en: Grants bonus health equal to 50% maximum mana.

augments.name: 山脉龙魂
augments.description_html: Grants the Mountain Dragon Soul.
augments.description: 授予山龙魂。
augments.description_en: Grants the Mountain Dragon Soul.

augments.name: 你摸不到
augments.description_html: Tier: Not Placed
augments.description: 等级：未放置
augments.description_en: Tier: Not Placed

augments.name: 海洋龙魂
augments.description_html: Grants the Ocean Dragon Soul, which has a modified base heal value of 100.
augments.description: 授予海洋龙魂，其基础治疗值修改为 100。
augments.description_en: Grants the Ocean Dragon Soul, which has a modified base heal value of 100.

augments.name: 防护面纱
augments.description_html: Replaces summoner spell with <spell>Poltergeist</spell>, casting <spell>Barrier</spell> and <spell>Ghost</spell> (both 5 seconds, <shield>shield 110–440</shield>).
augments.description: 用 Poltergeist 取代召唤师法术，施放 Barrier 和 Ghost（均为 5 秒，护盾 110–440）。
augments.description_en: Replaces summoner spell with Poltergeist, casting Barrier and Ghost (both 5 seconds, shield 110–440).

augments.name: 退敌力场
augments.description_html: Upon dropping below 60% or 30% of your maximum health, knock back all enemies within a 500 radius by 750 units.
augments.description: 当你的最大生命值低于 60% 或 30% 时，将 500 半径内的所有敌人击退 750 个单位。
augments.description_en: Upon dropping below 60% or 30% of your maximum health, knock back all enemies within a 500 radius by 750 units.

augments.name: 万用瞄准镜
augments.description_html: Gain ( 75 / 50) bonus attack range.
augments.description: 获得 ( 75 / 50) 额外攻击范围。
augments.description_en: Gain ( 75 / 50) bonus attack range.

augments.name: 自我毁灭
augments.description_html: At the start of the combat phase in each round, you have a bomb attached to you that detonates after 15 seconds, creating an explosion that deals true damage equal to 20% of the target's maximum health to enemies within 350 units and knocks them up for 0.75 seconds.The bomb's duration is not refreshed when the initial delay for the combat phase elapses.
augments.description: 每轮战斗阶段开始时，你身上都会附有一颗炸弹，它会在 15 秒后引爆，产生爆炸，对 350 单位内的敌人造成等于目标最大生命值 20% 的真实伤害，并将其击飞，持续 0.75 秒。战斗阶段初始延迟结束后，炸弹的持续时间不会刷新。
augments.description_en: At the start of the combat phase in each round, you have a bomb attached to you that detonates after 15 seconds, creating an explosion that deals true damage equal to 20% of the target's maximum health to enemies within 350 units and knocks them up for 0.75 seconds.The bomb's duration is not refreshed when the initial delay for the combat phase elapses.

augments.name: 暗影疾奔
augments.description_html: After dashing, blinking, or exiting stealth, gain 300 bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
augments.description: 冲刺、眨眼或退出潜行后，获得 300 点额外移动速度，持续 2 秒。
augments.description_en: After dashing, blinking, or exiting stealth, gain 300 bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

augments.name: 扇巴掌
augments.description_html: Immobilizing or grounding an enemy champion grants you 12 bonus Attack Damage or 20 Ability Power (Adaptive), stacking infinitely (5 second cooldown per cast instance). This effect lasts until the end of the current round phase.
augments.description: 使敌方英雄无法动弹或搁浅，可为你带来 12 点额外攻击力或 20 点法术强度（自适应），无限叠加（每个施法实例冷却时间为 5 秒）。该效果持续到当前回合阶段结束。
augments.description_en: Immobilizing or grounding an enemy champion grants you 12 bonus Attack Damage or 20 Ability Power (Adaptive), stacking infinitely (5 second cooldown per cast instance). This effect lasts until the end of the current round phase.

augments.name: 天音爆
augments.description_html: Granting a buff, heal, or shield to your ally deals 50 – 200 (based on level) true damage to enemies within 450 units of them and slows targets by 30% for 2 seconds (2 second cooldown).
augments.description: 为你的盟友提供增益、治疗或护盾，对周围 450 单位内的敌人造成 50 - 200（基于等级）真实伤害，并使目标减速 30%，持续 2 秒（2 秒冷却时间）。
augments.description_en: Granting a buff, heal, or shield to your ally deals 50 – 200 (based on level) true damage to enemies within 450 units of them and slows targets by 30% for 2 seconds (2 second cooldown).

augments.name: 旋转至胜
augments.description_html: Your spinning abilities deal 30% increased damage and benefit from 30 ability haste.
augments.description: 你的旋转技能造成的伤害提高 30%，并受益于 30 点技能急速。
augments.description_en: Your spinning abilities deal 30% increased damage and benefit from 30 ability haste.

augments.name: 叠角龙
augments.description_html: Increase the number of permanent stacks you gain from abilities by 75%.
augments.description: 使你从技能中获得的永久层数增加 75%。
augments.description_en: Increase the number of permanent stacks you gain from abilities by 75%.

augments.name: 属性！
augments.description_html: Upon selecting this augment, gain 2 Stat Bonus Anvils for free.
augments.description: 选择此增强后，可免费获得 2 个统计奖励铁砧。
augments.description_en: Upon selecting this augment, gain 2 Stat Bonus Anvils for free.

augments.name: 会心防御
augments.description_html: Gain Critical Defend Chance equal to 100% critical strike chance, up to 50%. Additionally, gain 25% critical strike chance.Critical Defend Chance: Grants you a chance to reduce an instance of damage taken by 20%.
augments.description: 获得暴击防御几率等于 100% 暴击几率，最高可达 50%。此外，获得 25% 暴击率。 暴击防御率：使你有机会减少 20% 的伤害。
augments.description_en: Gain Critical Defend Chance equal to 100% critical strike chance, up to 50%. Additionally, gain 25% critical strike chance.Critical Defend Chance: Grants you a chance to reduce an instance of damage taken by 20%.

augments.name: 质变：黄金阶
augments.description_html: Gain one random Gold augment, excluding the other two offerings in your current assortment.
augments.description: 获得一项随机黄金增强，不包括您当前分类中的其他两项产品。
augments.description_en: Gain one random Gold augment, excluding the other two offerings in your current assortment.

augments.name: 台风
augments.description_html: Basic attacks fire a bolt at an additional target that deals 30% AD physical damage and applies on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
augments.description: 普通攻击向额外目标发射一道箭矢，造成 30% AD 物理伤害，并以 100% 的效果施加命中效果。
augments.description_en: Basic attacks fire a bolt at an additional target that deals 30% AD physical damage and applies on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

augments.name: 终极不可阻挡
augments.description_html: Casting your ultimate ability grants you crowd control immunity for 3 seconds (8 second cooldown).
augments.description: 施放你的终极技能可以让你免疫人群控制，持续 3 秒（8 秒冷却时间）。
augments.description_en: Casting your ultimate ability grants you crowd control immunity for 3 seconds (8 second cooldown).

augments.name: 巫师式思考
augments.description_html: Grants 70 ability power.
augments.description: 赋予 70 点能力。
augments.description_en: Grants 70 ability power.

augments.name: 魔法转物理
augments.description_html: Convert all of your ability power into bonus attack damage at a rate of 1 bonus attack damage per 1.66 ability power. Additionally, increase your total attack damage by 15%.
augments.description: 将你的所有法术强度转化为额外攻击力，每 1.66 法术强度 1 点额外攻击力。此外，你的总攻击力增加 15%。
augments.description_en: Convert all of your ability power into bonus attack damage at a rate of 1 bonus attack damage per 1.66 ability power. Additionally, increase your total attack damage by 15%.
